description.en:
Ki Seung-joo is a young, multi-talented top star who has it all. Yoo Lee-hyun is a newcomer to the celebrity scene, but quickly making an impact. While they navigate the twists and turns of celebrity life, Lee-hyun is also intent on resolving something from her past. Both are hyper-focused on their careers. But their chance meeting on the set of a variety show sparks something in them that neither have felt before…

---
[Original Webtoon](https://ridibooks.com/books/3776000878)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.lezhinus.com/en/comic/because_its_love)
* [French / Français](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/lactrice-de-mon-coeur)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/97865)
description.fr:
Impossible pour lui d'oublier la scène dont il a été témoin: une femme a sauvé un passant dans la rue! C'est immédiatement le coup de foudre pour cet acteur de génie. Alors qu'il pense encore à son héroïne, il découvre avec surprise qu'elle va participer à son émission! Maintenant qu'il l'a retrouvée et qu'il connaît son identité, il va faire tout son possible pour entrer dans sa vie et lui jouer le grand jeu!

---
[Original Webtoon](https://ridibooks.com/books/3776000878)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.lezhinus.com/en/comic/because_its_love)
* [French / Français](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/lactrice-de-mon-coeur)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/97865)
description.id:
Ki Seung-joo adalah bintang muda multi talenta yang memiliki segalanya.Yoo Lee-hyun adalah pendatang baru di dunia selebriti, tetapi dengan cepat membuat dampak.Sementara mereka menavigasi liku-liku kehidupan selebriti, Lee-hyun juga berniat menyelesaikan sesuatu dari masa lalunya.keduanya sangat fokus pada karir mereka.tapi pertemuan kebetulan mereka di lokasi syuting variety show memicu sesuatu dalam diri mereka yang belum pernah mereka rasakan sebelumnya.

---
[Original Webtoon](https://ridibooks.com/books/3776000878)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.lezhinus.com/en/comic/because_its_love)
* [French / Français](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/lactrice-de-mon-coeur)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/97865)
description.ko:
22살의 나이로 산전수전을 다 겪고 톱스타 자리에 오른 승주. 스케줄을 향해 가던 길, 횡단보도에 쓰러진 행인을 향해 달려가는 이현을 발견한다. 첫눈에 알았다. 불의 속으로 한 치의 망설임 없이 뛰어드는 저 여자야말로 자신의 삶을 뒤흔들 것을.

“별거 아닌 핑계로 밀어내지 말고 되는 대로 오면 돼.”

밀어내는 이현과 불도저처럼 밀고 들어오는 승주. 이현은 과연 언제까지 승주를 밀어낼 수 있을까?

---
[Original Webtoon](https://ridibooks.com/books/3776000878)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.lezhinus.com/en/comic/because_its_love)
* [French / Français](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/lactrice-de-mon-coeur)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/97865)

biography.en:
**Associated Names:**
Lenshang
Park Saet Byeol
Park Saet-Byeol
Park SaetByeol
PARK Saet Byul
Park Saet-byul
Park Saetbyul
PARK Set-byul
박샛별
Park Sae Byeol
Park Sae-Byeol
Park SaeByeol

It's possible that this is a duo team as their art style is similar and their names are alike.

Currently it seems that both DCBO (대치동건물주/동건물주) and CDBO (청담동건물주) are alias for a different member who's the main artist in a certain series.

**Associated Names:**

Cheong Damdong Geonmulju
Daechi-dong Geonmulju
Daechidong Geonmulju
